english.segment1: One more chance and I swear I'll get it. call out your vultures.. Sharpening knives in the deepest shadows. run it by the council
english.segment2: we're stopping by to drop you in. and if you can't hold on. get it get it.. get it..
english.segment3: we took the stage and we stole your show. and if it's all you've got I'll. get it get it.. get it..
english.segment4: come out the shadows. let's bring this to the light. I'm almost certain. that this is gonna end tonight
english.segment5: I'll find a way out. find a way out of here
english.segment6: One more chance and I swear I'll get it. call out your vultures.. Sharpening knives in the deepest shadows. run it by the council
english.segment7: we dropped a bomb on this town. and they still can't get it right. for the moment it seems. to be a disaster
english.segment8: we dropped a bomb on this ghost town. follow me and you'll see. a catastrophe
english.segment9: we dropped a bomb on this town. and they still can't get it right. for the moment it seems. to be a disaster
english.segment10: let's set things right. I wasn't around when this town came crashing down. it's about to explode..
english.segment11: take cover!! we don't need a massacre!!. fall in line!! we've gotta get away!!
